betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The §6Enhanced Alloy Smelter§r has the same functionality as it's last tier with the advantage of it having §afaster processing rate than the Industrial tier§r.

To craft it, you'll need three §6Furnace§rs, two §6End Steel Ingot§rs, two §6Vibrant Bimetal Gear§rs, a §6Cauldron§r, and an §6Enhanced Machine Chassis§r.
If you already have the regular §6Alloy Smelter§r, you just need an Alloy Smelter, two End Steel Ingots, two Vibrant Bimetal Gears, and an Enhanced Machine Chassis.
